articles.title: Three Americans killed by IS gunman in Syria, US military says - BBC
articles.description: Two US soldiers and a civilian interpreter were killed in the attack, according to the US Central Command.
articles.content:
Two US soldiers and a US civilian interpreter have been killed in Syria in an ambush by an Islamic State (IS) gunman, the US Central Command (Centcom) has said.
Officials said three other service me… [+3034 chars]

articles.title: Atorvastatin recall may affect hundreds of thousands of patients – and reflects FDA’s troubles inspecting medicines manufactured overseas - Yahoo
